product_name: The North Face Better Than Naked Split Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Quick-drying, moisture-wicking and ready for serious training, the North Face Better Than Naked Split Shorts for women pack a ton of distance-ready features into a lightweight pair of running shorts. Polyester is used to create soft and flowing outer shorts; panels add to their breathability. FlashDry(TM) fibers in liner briefs dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Split design, 3 in. inseam, and body-mapped stretch panels increase mobility. Seamless inner-thigh construction and inner compression shorts eliminate potential chafing and increase overall comfort. Quick-access rear pocket makes it easy to reach energy gels. The North Face Better Than Naked Split Shorts for women feature reflective logos to increase your visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Quick-drying, moisture-wicking and ready for serious training, the North Face Better Than Naked Split Shorts for women pack a ton of distance-ready features into a lightweight pair of running shorts.
